column4: hi, i want to install ubuntu_edgy_server version but want to know if it will come with all libs, even tho' it has no X?
all the libs ?  what libs?
no, but why would you want them on a server with no X?   You can install X later if you want, then you would get them
there are a few app i needs that depend on X11 unfortunately
what apps?
well when you install with apt, it will pull in whatever you need
can't remember but is to do with rails + mongrel + nginx etc
well whatever is available to the desktop is available to the server, they use the same repository
aptitude search '~smultiverse'     is that what you are looing for?
ta
I believe there is some way to use synaptic too
http://people.debian.org/~dburrows/aptitude-doc/en/ch02s03.html  by the way so you don't think I just picked it out of thin air :)
k, thanks for the aptitude info
do you have multiverse?
pastebin your sources.list please
my mistake, it is not in the sources.list, i'll fix and try again
k
multiverse add fixed it, firefox plugin works, is it worhtwhile getting JRE v5.0 Update 10?
not for me
exactly
k, thanks for tip
